blogpage.heading: Another Blog
blogpage.para: This means that you will have to implement a path in the express server, that can be accessed with the GET method. It takes in as a url parameter the variable x and y. You should return from the path, the addition of the variables x and y. The names of the variables might not be as intuitive as in this example, but theyâ€™re usually as descriptive as they can.
